name: Death Within Earshot: Bose AR
description:
YOU are the detective in Death Within Earshot, an audio AR mystery. When Lord Reginald Skipwith is murdered at his own dinner party, it's up to you to interrogate the cast of colorful suspects, collect clues, and deduce who is the killer.

Using the Bose AR Frames gyroscopic directional controls, you can choose which order to question the suspects in, nod or shake your head to ask them questions to reveal their motives and secrets, and accuse who you think committed the heinous crime.

Blending Agatha Christie novels, radio plays, and the Choose Your Own Adventure books, Death Within Earshot is a unique audio game experience created as part of the Bose/Playcrafting Mega Game Jam in New York City by Team Computer Lunch - Andrew Garrahan, John Rhee, Ted Park, and Nyssa Shaw-Smith Gendelman Gendelman.
